name: Postr
details: Postr is a social media platform that allows users to share their thoughts with friends and family. Users can create an account, post content, and interact with other users. Postr was built using React, and Firebase.

name: AITranslate
details: AiTranslate offers seamless translation for Spanish, English, French, and German. Users select their language, input text, and receive accurate translations with a click. Utilizing the OpenAI API, translations appear instantly below the input, ensuring a smooth user experience.

name: Portfolio
details: A showcase of my Software Engineering Portfolio, highlighting my technical skills and project accomplishments.

name: PayPatrol
details: A time tracking and attendance management app that allows employees to clock in and out with a QR code reader and calculates weekly work hours and wages.
